wikipedia_page.main: George Edward Laking (17 March 1913 – June 1997) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for Wolverhampton Wanderers and Middlesbrough. Born in Harthill (near Rotherham), England he also played for a number of clubs in non-league and guested for several other clubs during World War II.

response: * Unofficial Channels: Letters between Alister McIntosh and Foss Shanahan, George Laking and Frank Corner 1946–1966 edited by Ian McGibbon (1999, Victoria University Press, Wellington NZ)
*Tribute to Sir George Laking from Prime Minister on TV One website
* Representative, A Profile of George Laking by Denis Welch
